head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOROWITZ, CLARA J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOROWITZ, CLARA J.

block.p: HOROWITZ-Clara J., on June 11, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Cantor Martin Horowitz, mother of Mina (Howard) Millendorf and Sandra (Alex) Bienenstock, grandmother of Beth Bienenstock, Tsipporah (Stuart) Nussbaum, Arona (Jeff) Waldman, Stuart (Eta) Bienenstock and Sharon Millendorf, and great-grandmother of seven. Sister of Era Rosenblatt, Elsie Rokeach and Pinny Rosenblatt. Burial Tuesday, June 13, 10:30 AM, at Har Hamemuchot, Jerusalem.

HOROWITZ-Clara J., on June 11, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Cantor Martin Horowitz, mother of Mina (Howard) Millendorf and Sandra (Alex) Bienenstock, grandmother of Beth Bienenstock, Tsipporah (Stuart) Nussbaum, Arona (Jeff) Waldman, Stuart (Eta) Bienenstock and Sharon Millendorf, and great-grandmother of seven. Sister of Era Rosenblatt, Elsie Rokeach and Pinny Rosenblatt. Burial Tuesday, June 13, 10:30 AM, at Har Hamemuchot, Jerusalem.
